protocol.text: Wild type (Col 0) and InsP 5-ptase transgenic Arabidopsis plants were grown in the NC State University Phytotron in a growth chamber, under short day conditions (8h light/16 dark) at 21C with a light intensity of ~ 150 Î¼mol m-2 sec-1.
Leaf samples (pooled from 10 plants/line) were collected on day 0 and day 7 of the RWC time course and frozen immediately in liquid N2.
Biotinylated target cRNA was synthesized using the Two cycle Target Labeling protocol (Affymetrix Inc, Santa Clara, CA).
RNA was isolated using the Plant RNeasy kit (Qiagen, Valencia, CA).
